scripts.prebuild: pnpm run generate || echo 'Protoc generation failed, continuing with existing files'
scripts.generate: node -e "require('fs').mkdirSync('./src/generated', {recursive: true})" && (protoc --plugin=./node_modules/.bin/protoc-gen-ts_proto --ts_proto_out=./src/generated --ts_proto_opt=esModuleInterop=true,outputJsonMethods=false,outputClientImpl=false -I ./src/proto ./src/proto/*.proto || echo 'Protoc not found, skipping generation')
